node.title: Race For the Crown
node.description: What is the goal of our business? Is it compatible with God’s mission? At the end of our lives, we want to say, “I have glorified You on Earth, I have finished the work which You have given me to do,” and “I have fought the good fight, I have finished the race, I have kept the faith.”  Finally, “There is laid up for me the crown of righteousness, which the Lord, the righteous Judge, will give me on that day.”  John 17:4 and 2 Timothy 4:7-8.
